long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Good News Only is a plugin that let's you "mute" specific words on websites so news items with these words won't be visible. It's a filter on the ever negative world so you won't have to be constantly bombarded by what's wrong with it. 

Made for people to improve their mental health ❤️
